daily_timetable.notes: This is a flexible template. Adjust timings slightly based on your energy levels and specific project deadlines. The key is consistent effort in each area.

common_structure.activity: Wake up, Morning Routine, Breakfast, Hydration
YouTube Video Production (Scripting/Recording/Editing for daily upload)
Daily Review & Plan for Tomorrow / English Practice (if not done earlier)
Wind down / Leisure (controlled, e.g., planning for YouTube content, short timed relaxation).

schedule.Saturday: Flex time for any project (deep dive or catch-up), or internship prep.
schedule.Sunday: Rest & Review (plan next week, light work if desired).

important_notes: Utilize the LLM-powered Distraction Blocker during focused work blocks (College Projects, Internship Prep, YouTube Production).
Take short, intentional breaks to avoid burnout and prevent distraction spirals. Set a timer for these breaks.
Ensure consistent sleep and nutrition for sustained energy and focus.

Gym attendance should be fit into your morning routine before 9 AM or in the evening after 8:30 PM if you feel energetic enough, ensuring it doesn't cut into critical work blocks. Prioritize consistency.
